document_data.name: Eostre
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Eostre''' was a [[mage]] member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|''Not now. I'm trying to figure out what type of villain puts [[orange]]s and [[onion]]s in the same box.''|Fist Eostre}}
document_data.Description: Eostre was a [[human]] woman with long curly dark hair, black eyes, and a pale complexion. She wore a [[wizard]]ly [[robe]]s uniform of the Flaming Fist and a [[circlet]], and carried a simple [[quarterstaff]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Eostre was stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]]'s barracks and prison, serving under Blaze [[Liara Portyr]] and [[Manip Seyama]]. She was tasked with cataloguing requisitioned produce, which was always, to her frustration, "organized by a rabid [[worg]]."
